apple_vendor_description: This couple with a heart emoji on Apple devices beautifully illustrates a romantic connection between a woman and a man, presented with distinct yet harmonious medium and light skin tones. Their forms are rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and soft rounded edges, creating a sense of warmth and tenderness. The heart, glowing with a soft, internal light, floats between them, symbolizing love, partnership, and shared affection, all captured with Apple's characteristic visual polish.
